import './post.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default function Post({post}) { const PF = "http://localhost:5000/image/blog2.jpg" return (
{post.photo && ()}
{ post .categories .map((c) => ({c.name})) }
{post.title} {new Date(post.createdAt).toDateString()} {post.desc}
) }
